description: For those looking for the perfect combination of responsiveness, stability and comfort with bomber protection and superb traction, the Bushido II has all that and more. They offer enhanced cushioning while also providing the user with a neutral, stable, lightweight, sticky and aggressive outsole. With unbeatable performance and protection on technical terrain, the Bushido II will excel on any mountain run.
name: La Sportiva Bushido II - Mens

specs.value: Dual Density FriXion® XT V-Groove2™ with Impact Brake System™
